trait.name: Bloodied Fury
entries: The boar has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on melee attack rolls while it is {@status Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the boar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Piercing damage and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
